price: On that Day all people will come forward in separate groups to be shown their deeds[3].
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
footnotes:
[3] From the place of Judgment to see the consequences of their deeds, whether to Paradise or to Hell.
 [MMCXIII]
